body.name: Extra Thick Seat Cushion for Office Chair Wheelchair Memory Foam Comfort Chair Pad Dual Layers Coccyx Gaming Pillow Sciatica Back Pain Relief Hip Tailbone Pressure Relief Antislip Cushions
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 6 mins
features: EXTRA THICK & LARGE SIZE – The Liffis large seat cushion offers greater width and greater depth, providing office workers with more comfort zone and excellent compression resistance. Measuring 17"x 16"x 4", this office seat cushion is thicker than other chair cushions, ensuring most suitable firmness and support. The large size provides enough support for people of all sizes.

RELIEVE BACK PAIN & SCIATICA - The castellated structure of the memory foam cushion top layer perfectly distributes the pressure when you sit, plus the ergonomic curve fitting to your body, the orthopedic seat cushion will relieve your pains in back, hips, sciatica, and further improve your sitting posture.

CREATIVE DUAL LAYERS FOAM DESIGN - Dual layers seat cushion combines comfort and support. A gel-infused castellated comfy memory foam top layer with a supportive high elastic foam base layer, provides both comfort and support. With this one specially structured creative new seat cushion, you'll say goodbye to other chair cushions which are either too hard or too soft.

EASY TO CARRY AND MAINTAIN - With the carrying handle, you can carry this seat cushion anywhere and use it as an office chair cushions, home seat cushion, wheelchair cushion, car seat cushion and more. The removable cover is machine washable. An extra thoughtful dust cloth cover keeps dust out and keeps the internal foam clean. The non-slip rubber bottom keeps the seat cushion firm on different chairs and surfaces.

SPECIAL GIFT For People You Care About - dual-layer memory foam seat cushion effectively relieves back pain, tailbone pain and improves bad body posture. If the one you love often needs to sit for a dozen hours per day, don’t hesitate to send him a pain relief memory foam seat cushion.
NOTICE: SLAP ON BOTH SURFACES OF THE SEAT CUSHION AFTER UNPACKED, AND IT CAN TAKE AS SOON AS 4 HOURS TO REBOUND TO ITS BEST SIZE AND SHAPE.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Double-layer Thick Memory Foam Seat Cushion for Comfort and Support

Reasons to Choose Our Chair Cushions - Large Size for Extra Comfort 4” extra thick & large dual layered chair pad perfectly distributes the pressure from the point of force to the surrounding. Keep using Liffis’ seat cushion, it can effectively relieve back pain, sciatica pain, tailbone pain, coccyx pain and improve sitting posture. An extra thick memory foam seat cushion is suitable for a variety of occasions, office chair, truck seat, car seat, wheelchair, table chair, desk chair, gaming chair, library chair etc.

Liffs Large Size Seat Cushions Are Suitable for Everyone and Provide Hours of Seating Comfort. Convenient Carrying Handle Take your seat cushion with you. Whether outdoors, in the office, or in your favorite chair, take your chair cushion with you to keep you comfortable on the go. Pain Relief & Improve Sitting Posture Make yourself comfortable with Liffs seat cushions. Double layer of stress-relieving memory foam for just the right amount of firmness and support. Breathable Washable Cloth Cover Special anti-slip silicone is added to the bottom to ensure the seat cushion is firmly in place. Use on office chairs, dining chairs, gaming chairs, wheelchairs.
Perfect Holiday Gifts & Birthday Gifts for Family & Friends

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cushion ever
reviews.reviewText: I am permanently in a wheelchair so seat cushions are very important to me this is the best cushion I've ever bought in my entire life it's more than I expected it's thick when you sit on it it feels amazing but the best part of all when you stand up it fills right back up again I love the fact that in the front of this cushion has the hill which separates your legs when you're in a wheelchair this is important because your legs tend to always be together with this cushion it's separates your legs and it's more of a comfortable fit and feel when you're sitting down this cushion is so amazing that I'm going to buy another one I bought one for my manual wheelchair but now I will be buying one for my motorized chair as well being wheelchair bound I have bought a lot of cushions but this one is the best so if you're looking for a cushion for your wheelchair your desk chair at your office or just a chair in your house that's uncomfortable this is the cushion to buy it is worth every penny

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great echonomical product.
reviews.reviewText: Overall comfort is very important as my husband is in the wheelchair several hours a day.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 1, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked over a year - reordered another
reviews.reviewText: This is the second one I ordered. The first one was effective just a little over a year of daily use, and I am approaching 300 lbs. rear is getting sore again - so time for another. I have no complaints about ordering something annually that works for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not What I Expected
reviews.reviewText: Cushion great size & 4 inch thickness. Comfort not as described, gets mushy when sitting working for many hours. Does not in my opinion support rear body area. It’s ok for general use but not for someone that may have other issues. Delivery was fast, easy to order, price slightly high for quality & description. Will look into medical type grade of foam cushion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This cushion is perfect for me. I am a smaller person 125lbs and 5' 5" tall. I sit on an office chair in my studio for most of the day. Needed something to cushion my hips and bottom. This is soft, but not too soft that I don't sink to the bottom of the chair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality product
reviews.reviewText: Gave as gift. Recipient very happy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: got it to help me get out of chairs - getting up so so much easier

reviews.reviewTitle: If you need extra cushioning on a seat, this is it!
reviews.reviewText: I used to have a computer chair that had lost its padding on the seat. This fit perfectly between the arms of the chair, and gave me back the comfort I needed when sitting for long periods of time.
Muy buen cojín de buena altura y muy cómodo

I heard about this product from a family member and decided to try it myself. I bought one. It arrived last week. I found it comfortable. I have had a problem with my right hip and this cushion seems to alleviate my hip pain. This cushion provides a good support and I can sit in my chair for a prolonged period without feeling tired. So far I love it and I may just order another one for my husband who sits in front of a computer for hours everyday for his work.

reviews.reviewTitle: Super incomodo se aplasta a lo pocos minutos de uso
reviews.reviewText: Super incomodo se aplasta a lo pocos minutos de uso

J'ai acheté ce coussin pcq j'ai un problème à la hanche et la position assise sur ma chaisière d'éducatrice n'est pas du tout confortable. J'ai réglé mon problème avec l'utilisation de ce coussin. Mes collègues veulent s'en procurer un aussi! J'aime bien la petite poignée pour le déplacer d'un local à l'autre.
